name: WebRTC Peer-to-peer connections
description: Method of allowing two users to communicate directly, browser to browser using the RTCPeerConnection API.

links.title: Plug-in for support in IE & Safari
Introducing WebRTC 1.0 and interoperable real-time communications in Microsoft Edge

notes.general: The legacy Edge browser also offers a compatible implementation known as [ObjectRTC](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/ie/archive/2014/10/27/bringing-interoperable-real-time-communications-to-the-web.aspx). See [Object RTC](https://caniuse.com/#feat=objectrtc) for support details for that API.

byNum.1: BlackBerry 10 recognizes RTCPeerConnection but real support is unconfirmed.
byNum.2: Edge does not support RTCDataChannel. See [API Catalogue](https://web.archive.org/web/20190327013248/https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-edge/platform/catalog/?q=specName%3Awebrtc)
